scenario_text.value: Hey! Wasn’t that Haru just now?!
I’m afraid he flew the coop immediately.
Wowzers! That boy has some legs on him!

Uh, hey, I know we’re giving chase here, but
are we sure that’s Haru? Not a Kenzoku?

Hmm... Something’s off for sure, but we can’t
draw any conclusions yet.

We’ve got him beat on numbers if he attacks,
so we’ll be fine. Let’s go see who that is.
